root.pub-comments: Kaufman includes his groups Maipurean, Arauan, and Guajiboan (1990a) in a Macro-Arawakan cluster; however, since there is no real evidence that these are related (see Kaufman 1994:57), this should not be interpreted as an established (or even likely, for that matter) genetic grouping. David Payne (1991) and Desmond Derbyshire (1992:103) tentatively group Maipurean, Arauan, and Guajiboan, as does Kaufman (though they do not include Candoshi), but they add Puquina and Harakmbet to their tentative Arawakan proposal.
